item.title: All About Shade Net
item.dc:creator: Purva Traders
item.description:
What Is Shade Net ? Shade net is a knitted HDPE material used in different Applications but it is main application is in agriculture. It is used to Safeguard agricultural produce from Environmental adverse effects like intense sunlight, strong winds, heavy rain, etc. It helps to reduce wastage of crops and thus increase their productivity. It is commonly used to cover the agricultural fields  It is also used …

item.title: Shade Net House
item.dc:creator: Purva Traders
item.description:
What is Shade Net house? Shade Net House is a structure enclosed by agricultural mesh or any other woven material to pass through the required sunlight, humidity, and air gaps. This creates a favorable environment for plant growth. Use of Shade Net house shade net house helps in the cultivation of flower plants, leaf plants, …
